title: Newlywed aged 76 shot wife in buttocks after she refused to have sex after six months of marriage
text:
News Newlywed aged 76 shot wife in buttocks after she refused to have sex after six months of marriage Donald Royce is charged with aggravated battery after he admitted shooting his wife when she refused to consummate their marriage Share By Natalie Evans Chris Murphy 01:15, 9 FEB 2017 Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Husband shoots wife in the BUTTOCKS after she refuses him sex Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A newlywed pensioner shot his wife in the buttocks after she refused to consummate the marriage. 
Donald Royce, 76, reportedly told police his 62-year-old wife refused to have sex with him after six months of marriage . 
The couple are believed to have argued over the sleeping arrangements at their home in Lehigh Acres, Florida, Fox 4 reported. 
Lee County Sheriff's Office said Royce admitted shooting his bride in the buttocks while she told Four in Your Corner the situation is a "nightmare". Read More Russian law decriminalising domestic violence slammed by Prime Minister Theresa May Donald Royce told police he shot his wife after she refused to have sex (Photo: Chris Murphy) 
After getting hitched in August, after six years of knowing each other, Royce told officers they were yet to have sex. 
The pair share their home with a roommate, who told police she heard two gun shots. 
She claims when she went to investigate, Royce pointed the gun at her but she convinced him to allow his wife to get medical help. The incident happened at the couple's home in Florida (Photo: Chris Murphy) Police at the scene in Lehigh Acres (Photo: Chris Murphy) 
According to an arrest report, Royce told deputies arriving at the scene: “I shot her and the gun is in my room.” 
He later claimed he hadn't intended to shoot his wife but meant to scare her by shooting the mattress. 
Royce's wife, who has not been named, was taken to Lee Memorial Hospital with gunshot wounds to the buttocks and hip. Read More Woman arrested after living with rotting body 'of rapist boyfriend she stabbed to death' for months Royce is now charged with aggravated battery (Photo: Chris Murphy) 
She is now recovering from her ordeal at home and told Fox she never thought her husband was capable of doing something like this. 
Royce has now been charged with aggravated battery. 
Neighbour April Bailey told Fox: "That's ridiculous a grown adult having a temper tantrum about sex. 
"A woman should have a right to her own body, regardless of age or marriage status." Like us on Facebook
